org.jsimpledb.core.ListFieldChangeListener

    Package Description
    org.jsimpledb.core
    Core classes for the JSimpleDB Java persistence layer.

    • Uses of ListFieldChangeListener in org.jsimpledb.core

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Transaction.addListFieldChangeListener(int storageId, int[] path, KeyRanges[] filters, ListFieldChangeListener listener)
      Monitor for changes within this transaction to the specified ListField as seen through a path of references.
      void Transaction.removeListFieldChangeListener(int storageId, int[] path, KeyRanges[] filters, ListFieldChangeListener listener)
